content: Is there a way to track the nutritional value provided by medications? For instance this drug gave the patient 250 calories or 40 meq of potassium. There is need to track, total and plan all the nutrition for a patient - including those represented by NutritionProducts as part of NutritionIntake and also the medications (either with Medication or MedicinalproductDefinition). The medication resources seem to focus on the ingredients.
That would have to be by an extension.
